name: Whack-A-Mole VR
description:
Built this as part of a VR assignment, it turned out quite fun to battle your friends for the top score.  There are other ways to score beyond the cabinet, try throwing your hammer at the bonus moles!      

There's instructions inside the game before you start the timer, good luck!

Throwing hammer and retrieving it is actually funner than hitting the moles, but it has sparked some intense family competitions so I hope you enjoy this mini game.
